Package adrenaline.data.data_for_client.data_for_game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EndGameStatus
    This class is sent to the client when a game ends.
    MapInfo
    This class is sent to the client to inform them of the map chosen for the game.
    MapSetUp
    This class is sent to the client to ask them which map they want to choose for the game.
    MovementAndGrabOptions
    This class is sent to the client to ask them which square they want to move to with the MoveAndGrab Action and what they want to grab from there.
    MovementOptions
    This class is sent to the client to ask them which square they want to move to with the Move Action.
    PowerUpEffectOptions
    This class is sent to ask the client in which way they want to use the chosen power up.
    PowerUpOptions
    This class is sent to the client to ask which of their owned power ups they want to use.
    ReloadRequest
    This class is sent to the client to ask if they want to reload any of their unloaded weapons.
    ShootOptions
    This class is sent to the client to ask which weapon they want to use for the shoot action and, if the action is 'adrenaline', the ids of squares they can move to.
    SpawnPointSetUp
    This class is sent to the client to ask which square they want to spawn on by discarding the power up of the same color.
    TagbackRequest
    This class is sent to the client to ask if they want to use their Tagback Grenade.
    TargetOptions
    This class is sent to the client to ask which targets they want to hit with the shoot action.
    TimeOutNotice
    This class is sent to the client to notify that the timer in Controller has run out.
    Turn
    This class is sent to the client to ask which action they want to perform in their turn.
    WeaponModeOptions
    This class is sent to the client to ask which effect they want to perform with the chosen weapon in the shoot action.
    WeaponsToDiscard
    This class is sent to the client to ask which weapon they want to discard after exceeding the maximum number of three.
